website_summaries.verdict: Wine lovers and anyone looking for a slightly luxurious option will adore this intensely hydrating, spa-grade scrub.
pros: Suitable for all skin types, but great for parched skin in need of a moisture surge
All-natural ingredients, including grape seeds as scrubbing granules, leave skin feeling silky
Scent is slightly woody with a hint of citrus
cons: It is expensive for the amount of product you receive

customer_reviews.title: In a Class By Itself - Good Stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Bottom Line: This is really good scrub. I started buying it for my wife on special occassions but after I was treated to an application, by her, I realized that this is like nothing else on the market. Now we keep it in the shower as often as we can afford it. Beware the Merlot version is NOT similar -- a much different product aromatically and sensually. Cabernet can be hard to find and hard to afford but you will not be dissappointed if you or your loved one enjoy a true spa-scrub-experience. Not oily, no residue, intoxicating fragrance.
customer_reviews.author: Wampage

customer_reviews.title: Scam. Used products!
customer_reviews.text: Product was not new. Box was open and wasnt full. Max 2/3 of USED product available. SCAM!!!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: works well but
customer_reviews.text: After showering with the scrub it leaves a smooth feel to the skin but the smell is not my preference. It's subtle and not at all strong and the smell holds strong for several hours but I like something a little fruitier. I bought it because I was trying several different exfoliating scrubs to help with skin drying and this one does do that very well. Would I buy it again...yes but frequently like others...no.
customer_reviews.author: Jay carrero

customer_reviews.title: Just like a Spa Treatment!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this scrub! The smell is incredible, and it leaves my skin feeling soft and smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Anilise

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived open. Please let me know how this is sanitary or safe during these times? Would appreciate a refund asap.
customer_reviews.author: McS

customer_reviews.title: My fav facial  exfoliater
customer_reviews.text: Love this scrub for my face! Leave it feeling soft and hydrated very dope
customer_reviews.author: Ángel

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, no question - but product leaked during shipping and not usable.
customer_reviews.author: illinois

customer_reviews.title: Great product! The skin is left soft smooth and ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! The skin is left soft smooth and well hydrated. It also smells great and even leaves the bathroom smelling good. I gave it a 4 instead of five star because I saw no improvement in my cellulite, regardless I will be getting this again to exfoliate in the upcoming winter months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: big waste of money
customer_reviews.text: waste of money. was at least half empty when it arrived. stinks so bad i'm not sure why anyone would repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: angie jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product but I the one I got was a tester jar! didn't realize they sold those too!
customer_reviews.author: HH

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny
customer_reviews.text: Expensive, but I love it. My skin is soooo soft and honestly, I think it is worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Peanut

customer_reviews.title: bomb
customer_reviews.text: I love this scrub. The smell, the exfoliation. Pricey but I got to have to it. Come in newer current packaging
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Earthy smell
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t care for the smell of this; I don’t think it had turned or anything but it didn’t smell good or at all like the body butter by this brand. I also didn’t feel it did anything special for my skin, even in terms of exfoliating I’ve had better. It’s just an ok body scrub, one you’ll have to like the earthy smell of.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought at Sephora and fell in love...so got another! Wonderful texture and smells like grapes. Very lovely. Get the hand cream too!!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: I love this scrub
customer_reviews.text: I love this scrub, I've used it for years, when I run out I'm always surprised when I reorder by how much I miss using it. The scrub feels like it helps my circulation, especially during the colder months in the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabet38

customer_reviews.title: Smells good but that's about it
customer_reviews.text: Glorified body scrub. Does not firm or tighten skin at all! Smells good but that's about it.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Wiesmore

customer_reviews.title: Love it, Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I need to find a much larger size of this product, I absolutely love it, takes care of the dark spots that I used to have on my knees & elbows, plus it feels like it helps increase circulation. Seems like it makes my arthritis feel better!!! I do feel like it has a slimming effect, probably due to the increase in circulation.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabet38

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, even though it is a little bit messy in the shower!
customer_reviews.author: Eloise Moffet

customer_reviews.title: Buy this scrub!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product! The best I've ever used. Leaves skin clean and beautifully hydrated. A bit pricey but worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Laura A Voght

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I would only use this as a scub alone. Its not great for a body wash or moisturizer, but it is used to polish dimply, cellulited skin that needs a complete, thereaputic, aromatic (lemon) scrub. As I bathed with this, the water made the condensed mixture into a milky texture and the smell was heavenly. It transported me from my NYC apartment to some exotic location in my mind. Great for aromatherapy! Worth the money if you use twice a week as directed!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Pearlman

customer_reviews.title: It has a great consistency and left my skin feeling delightful
customer_reviews.text: I had the treatment at the spa in Bordeaux with this scrub. It has a great consistency and left my skin feeling delightful!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
